metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian3 from the Heapside Kitchen Helper Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the halfling behind the backdoor of the Elfsong tavern's kitchen.

0.speaker: Slumgullion
0.text: I used to be able to pay to eat at this tavern. Now look at me - begging for scraps at the back door.

1.speaker: Slumgullion
1.text: You pray to the gods you always have food.
